body_html:
Bazel cannot include workspaces tranasitively.
So you will need to import workspace.bzl in your WORKSPACE file, and call tf_workspace() to add all TF dependencies when including TF as an external project.

You can check servo or tf estimator for example usage.
body_text:
Bazel cannot include workspaces tranasitively.
So you will need to import workspace.bzl in your WORKSPACE file,  and call tf_workspace() to add all TF dependencies when including TF as an external project.
You can check servo or tf estimator for example usage.
body:
Bazel cannot include workspaces tranasitively.
So you will need to import workspace.bzl in your WORKSPACE file,  and call tf_workspace() to add all TF dependencies when including TF as an external project.

You can check servo or tf estimator for example usage.
